Key Match Events: Jhon Córdoba scored the opening goal in the 8th minute
James Rodríguez scored a penalty in the 15th minute
Luis Díaz scored the third goal in the 41st minute
Richard Ríos scored the fourth goal in the 70th minute
Miguel Borja scored the fifth and final goal in stoppage time
Post-Match Reflections: James Rodriguez praised his team's performance and their current form
Jhon Cordoba mentioned the importance of quick goal scoring
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place at the State Farm Stadium in Glendale, Arizona
Colombia's unbeaten run now stands at 27 matches
Others: Colombia will face Uruguay in the semifinals in Charlotte, North Carolina on Wednesday
Panama's best-ever performance at the Copa América ended with the loss to Colombia
